item.title: 高管情绪低落，小盘股阴霾加深
item.description: 小盘股公司的投资者情绪比几个月来更糟。事实证明，这些公司董事会内部的情绪也没好到哪里去。【原文：Investor sentiment around small-cap companies is worse than it’s been in months. As it turns out, the mood isn’t much better inside their corporate boardrooms.】

item.title: 日产、Seven & I 交易的余波使日本公司处于弱势
item.description: 这似乎是一次非凡的爱国主义和团结精神的展示：无论是濒临破产的汽车制造商日产汽车公司，还是陷入困境的便利店巨头 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：It seemed like an extraordinary display of patriotism and unity: Japan’s biggest companies would come together to save their own, whether ailing carmaker Nissan Motor Co. or besieged convenience store giant Seven & i Holdings Co.】

item.title: 中国电池企业杉杉将进入法院主导的重组程序
item.description: 中国法院受理了锂离子电池制造商杉杉集团股份有限公司的重组案，这是中国越来越多由法院主导的债务计划之一。【原文：A Chinese court accepted a restructuring for lithium-ion battery maker Shanshan Group Co., in one of a growing number of court-led debt plans in the country.】

item.title: 越南国家银行誓言保持利率稳定以促进经济增长
item.description: 越南央行今年将致力于保持利率稳定，以帮助企业和促进经济发展，因为这个东南亚国家今年的宏伟目标是实现至少 8%的经济增长。【原文：Vietnam’s central bank will aim to keep interest rates stable this year in a bid to help businesses and boost the economy, as the Southeast Asian nation targets an ambitious goal of at least 8% growth this year.】

item.title: 英国养老金以环境、社会和公司治理为由向 Amundi 和 Invesco 转移 280 亿英镑
item.description: 英国养老金主信托基金 "人民养老金"（People's Pension）授予 Amundi SA 和 Invesco Ltd. 两项任务，总额达 280 亿英镑（355 亿美元），理由是它们具有可持续性和负责任的投资资质。【原文：UK pension master trust the People’s Pension has awarded two mandates totaling £28 billion ($35.5 billion) to Amundi SA and Invesco Ltd., citing their sustainability and responsible investment credentials.】

item.title: 规则迫使改变投资组合，土耳其货币市场基金规模缩水
item.description: 土耳其货币市场基金管理的资产减少，业绩下滑，因为要求这些基金在投资组合中至少有 10% 持有以里拉计价的政府债券的最后期限临近。【原文：Turkish money-market funds have seen assets under management decline and performance drop as a deadline approaches for them have at least 10% of their portfolios in lira-denominated government bonds.】

item.title: 特朗普关税在即，印度考虑削减汽车和化学品关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度官员正在探讨如何降低包括汽车和化学品在内的多种进口产品的关税，以规避美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁的对等征税。【原文：Indian officials are exploring ways to lower tariffs on a wide range of imports, including cars and chemicals, in a bid to evade US President Donald Trump’s threatened reciprocal levies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通的 Benhamou 认为美国股市在春季反弹前受阻
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：US stocks will struggle early March amid weaker economic data before they rally once again later in spring, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Ilan Benhamou.】

item.title: 加纳宣布迫使埃尼公司与当地生产商合并油田的命令无效
item.description: 加纳正在撤销一项要求埃尼公司（Eni SpA）将其近海油田与当地一家生产商发现的油田合并的指令，从而有可能解决长达五年的僵局。【原文：Ghana is withdrawing a directive requiring Eni SpA to merge its offshore oil field with a discovery made by a local producer, potentially settling a five-year standoff.】

item.title: 美俄会谈刺激了为普京战争提供资金的债券需求
item.description: 由于美国关系解冻的迹象刺激了对当地资产的需求，俄罗斯国内市场的借贷量达到了乌克兰战争爆发以来的最高水平。【原文：Russia is borrowing at the highest volumes on the domestic market since the start of the war in Ukraine as signs of a thaw in US relations boost demand for local assets.】

item.title: 泰国大亨的房地产部门计划将资产翻番至 90 亿美元
item.description: 泰国第二富豪控制的一家酒店和购物中心开发商计划在未来五年内将其资产增加一倍，因为预计旅游业的增长和经济复苏将推动对住宿和办公空间的需求。【原文：A Thai developer of hotels and shopping malls controlled by the country’s second-richest man plans to double its assets over the next five years on expectation tourism growth and economic recovery will drive demand for accommodation and office space.】

item.title: 欧洲股市大涨会持续多久？
item.description:
美国市场可能主宰全球，但欧洲股市却经历了有史以来最辉煌的时期之一。在本期万亿节目中，我们将讨论这种情况能否持续。【原文：

The US market may dominate the globe, but European equities have had one of their best runs ever. In this episode of Trillions, we discuss if it can last.

】

item.title: Ocado 因前景黯淡、仓库扩张放缓而下滑
item.description: 由于投资者担心其自动化杂货仓库技术的订单量，Ocado Group Plc 公布了不及预期的税前亏损，股价创下八个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Ocado Group Plc shares slumped the most in eight months after reporting a worse-than-expected pretax loss amid investor concerns about the order book for its automated grocery warehouse technology.】

item.title: PLDT 希望获得 KKR 股份以控制菲律宾金融科技部门
item.description: PLDT 公司有意收购 KKR & Co.公司在其金融科技关联公司中的股份，此举可能会让这家菲律宾顶级电信公司重新控制这家现已盈利的企业。【原文：PLDT Inc. is interested in acquiring KKR & Co.’s stake in its fintech affiliate in a move that could allow the top Philippine telecom company retake control of the now-profitable business.】

item.title: 香港顶级开发商摆脱低迷，利润增长 17
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商公布了上半年利润增长情况，该公司凭借房地产销售收入的跃升度过了香港房地产的长期低迷期。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest property developer posted an increase in first-half profit as it navigated the city’s prolonged real estate slump with a jump in property sales revenue.】

item.title: 伊姆普拉特公司（Implats）在钯金价格下跌之际重新审视加拿大矿山的前景
item.description: 安派达铂金控股有限公司（Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd.）表示，由于用于汽油车的钯金属价格低迷，该公司正在审查加拿大一座钯矿的未来。【原文：Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd. said it’s reviewing the future of a Canadian palladium mine as the price of the metal used in gasoline vehicles languishes.】

item.title: 食品价格飙升，赞比亚通胀率创 39 个月新高
item.description: 由于受到一个多世纪以来最严重干旱的影响，以及克瓦查的急剧贬值继续推高肉类和谷物成本，赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在二月份加速上升，创下三年多来的新高。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation accelerated to a more than three-year high in February as the impact of its worst drought in more than a century and a steep depreciation in the kwacha continued to push up meat and grain costs.】

item.title: 英国碳捕集投资因规则不确定而受阻
item.description: Drax Group Plc 呼吁在其英格兰北部的生物质发电厂加强碳污染控制投资之前，要有更多的监管确定性。【原文：Drax Group Plc called for more regulatory certainty before it steps up investments in carbon pollution controls at its biomass plant in northern England.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀因基数效应和强劲经济而持续走高
item.description: 在能源基数效应和经济繁荣的推动下，西班牙 2 月份的通胀率依然居高不下。【原文：Spanish inflation remained elevated in February, driven by energy base effects and a booming economy.】

item.title: 2024 年底瑞士经济增长 0.5%，高于首次预期
item.description: 得益于制造业的复苏，瑞士经济以近两年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Switzerland’s economy grew at the fastest pace in almost two years thanks to a recovery in manufacturing.】

item.title: 南非寻求与美国在紧张关系中达成 "有意义的协议
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）表示，在两国关系紧张的情况下，南非希望与美国就外交和贸易问题达成广泛协议。【原文：South Africa wants to reach a broad-ranging agreement with the US on diplomacy and trade amid strained ties between the two nations, President Cyril Ramaphosa said.】

item.title: 普京特使瞄准特朗普和马斯克，引诱美国达成乌克兰协议
item.description: 基里尔-德米特里耶夫（Kirill Dmitriev）本周在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的X平台上撰文，宣布美俄合作是 "应对世界挑战的关键"。随后，他发布了一段视频，描绘了美国和沙特阿拉伯搭乘马斯克的 SpaceX 火箭联合执行火星任务的情景。【原文：Kirill Dmitriev wrote on Elon Musk’s X platform for the first time since 2012 this week to declare US-Russia cooperation was “key to address world challenges.” Then he posted a video graphic depicting a joint mission to Mars with the US and Saudi Arabia on what appears to be one of Musk’s SpaceX rockets.】

item.title: 开发商泰勒温培预计今年英国房屋销售量将上升
item.description: 英国最大的开发商之一预计将在 2025 年售出更多住宅，这为经历了两年艰难时期的房屋建筑商提供了一些安慰。【原文：One of Britain’s biggest developers expects to sell more homes in 2025, offering some relief after a grueling two-years for housebuilders.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行任命凯勒为瑞士公司业务主管
item.description: 法国巴黎银行已任命 Michael Keller 为瑞士企业业务负责人。【原文：BNP Paribas has appointed Michael Keller as head of its Swiss corporate coverage.】

item.title: Aviva 盈利超出预期，Direct Line 交易 "步入正轨
item.description: Aviva Plc 公布的全年利润超出预期，因为该公司继续想方设法让现有客户购买更多产品。【原文：Aviva Plc reported full-year profit that topped expectations as it continued to find ways to get more of its products into the hands of existing customers.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人寻求法院指导以简化清盘程序
item.description: 全球负债最多的建筑商中国恒大集团的清算人正在寻求香港法院的指导，以确定债券持有人是否可以加入一个委员会，从而简化公司的清盘程序。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group, the world’s most indebted builder, are seeking guidance from a Hong Kong court on whether bondholders can be part of a committee that would streamline the company’s winding-up process.】

item.title: 日本邮政计划出售价值 42 亿美元的银行部门股权
item.description: 日本邮政控股公司计划出售日本邮政银行股份有限公司（Japan Post Bank Co.【原文：Japan Post Holdings Co. plans to sell a stake in Japan Post Bank Co. that could raise ¥630 billion ($4.2 billion), the latest disposal in the former state-run giant’s decade-long privatization efforts.】

item.title: 西班牙看到欧盟成员国团结在共同防御基金周围
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）表示，欧盟各国可能会团结在共同国防开支的周围，因为该地区正在寻找加强安全的方法。【原文：European Union nations are likely to rally around common defense spending, as the region looks at ways to bolster its security, according to Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo.】
